name: dragee
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a sweet made of a nut, seed, etc. with a hard sugar shell: Almond dragées should be stored at room temperature. The dragées are produced in revolving pans that keep the nuts in motion while they are coated in sugar syrup.
a very small, hard sugar ball, used for decorating cakes, biscuits, etc.: The wedding cake was decorated with hundreds of silver dragees. Add a dragée to the centre of each of the chocolate flowers.
